page.title: 07AXMINSTER MARKET
page.content:
Axminster Market.
In Axminster every thursday,all around the church and in Trinity square there is a market held. The market is a friendly place with lots of colour and noise,you can buy anything from fresh fish to fruit and vegetables. As you walk into the market from Lyme street,you first come across a cloth stall,where good quality cloth can be bought cheeply.Opposite to this is a jumper and "T"shirt stall,with a curtain stall beside it. The Silver street part of the market has a variety of fruit and vegetable stalls as well as some hard ware stalls. People come from miles around just to visit the market.
